00085 #define CFE_EVS_BINARY_FILTER    0
00086 
00090 #define  CFE_EVS_NO_FILTER        0x0000       
00091 #define  CFE_EVS_FIRST_ONE_STOP   0xFFFF       
00092 #define  CFE_EVS_FIRST_TWO_STOP   0xFFFE       
00093 #define  CFE_EVS_FIRST_4_STOP     0xFFFC       
00094 #define  CFE_EVS_FIRST_8_STOP     0xFFF8       
00095 #define  CFE_EVS_FIRST_16_STOP    0xFFF0       
00096 #define  CFE_EVS_FIRST_32_STOP    0xFFE0       
00097 #define  CFE_EVS_FIRST_64_STOP    0xFFC0       
00098 #define  CFE_EVS_EVERY_OTHER_ONE  0x0001       
00099 #define  CFE_EVS_EVERY_OTHER_TWO  0x0002       
00100 #define  CFE_EVS_EVERY_FOURTH_ONE 0x0003       
00105 #define CFE_EVS_DEBUG            0x01          
00106 #define CFE_EVS_INFORMATION      0x02          
00107 #define CFE_EVS_ERROR            0x03          
00108 #define CFE_EVS_CRITICAL         0x04          
00113 #define CFE_EVS_PORT1            0x01
00114 #define CFE_EVS_PORT2            0x02
00115 #define CFE_EVS_PORT3            0x03
00116 #define CFE_EVS_PORT4            0x04

00133 /* 
00134 ** \brief  EVS Log type definition. This is declared here so ES can include it 
00135 **  in the reset area structure 
00136 */
00137 typedef struct {
00138     uint16 Next;                              
00139     uint16 LogCount;                          
00140     uint8  LogFullFlag;

00142     uint16 LogOverflowCounter;                
00143     CFE_EVS_Packet_t LogEntry[CFE_EVS_LOG_MAX];
00145 } CFE_EVS_Log_t;
